featured.text: Their relaxing bath will be 17 a full fluff dry and brush-out.
Here all the dogs are given a bath using professional shampoo and conditioners in a massaging tub.
Using a heating pad or taking warm baths can sometimes help to _____ pain in the lower back.

definition.zh_def: 洗澡的行為或過程，通常在浴缸或淋浴中進行。
definition.en_def: The act or process of washing oneself, typically in a bathtub or shower.
definition.example: I like to take a relaxing bath after a long day.
